text: 9|47|Yadi sihamte tomalokara lagata olalehemtena, tente tomalokara asanti asubidhahe brd'dhi karailehemtena arau tomalokara majata phitana srsti karaibalai yathasadhya cesta karailehemtena, arau tomalokara majate sihamtara babe katha sunara manuho ache. Allaha yalimasakalara bisaye sabisesa aragata.
